articles.title: Crypto-crasher Do Kwon jailed for 15 years over $40bn UST bust
articles.summary:
Judge said his fraud was on 'epic, generational scale'

Terraform Labs founder Do Kwon will spend 15 years in jail after pleading guilty to committing fraud.…
articles.reasoning: The article details legal and regulatory actions against a tech company founder for fraud, involving securities laws, extradition, and court sentencing, directly aligning with governance, compliance, and legal oversight in enterprise IT.

articles.title: Reddit launches High Court challenge to Australia's social media ban for kids
articles.summary: It said the landmark policy has serious implications for Australians' privacy and political rights.
articles.reasoning: The article discusses legal challenges to a government-imposed social media ban, involving compliance, policy implications, and corporate response, which directly relates to IT governance frameworks and regulatory adherence.

articles.title: Silicon photonics won’t matter ‘anytime soon’ says Broadcom CEO
articles.summary:
Chips ’n’ code giant sitting on $50bn of custom AI accelerator orders, sees more to come

Silicon photonics won’t matter in the datacenter “anytime soon,” according to Broadcom CEO Hock Tan.…
articles.reasoning: The article covers Broadcom's strategic R&D investments and multi-year customer commitments for AI hardware, reflecting IT governance decisions around technology adoption and resource allocation.
